AeroSeal Duct Sealing

Seal leaks from the inside out for comfort, efficiency, and air quality.

What is AeroSeal?

Patented, non-toxic particles seal duct leaks from the inside, verified in real time.

The Process

1

Measure

Baseline leakage with computerized tooling.

2

Seal

Particles agglomerate only at leak sites.

3

Verify

Live read-out and before/after report.

Benefits

  • 20–30% energy savings typical
  • 85–95% leak reduction
  • More even room temperatures
  • Less dust & allergens
